name: Daemonium Porcus
description:
Two slaves have been sent into the maze to retrieve an ancient relic at the center. They must work together to get in and out fast. Meanwhile, a gruesome monster roams the halls of the maze, looking for its next meal. Who will emerge victorious, the slaves, or... Daemonium Porcus? 

As a slave: Get to the center of the maze to get the relic and then get to the exit. Run from porcus and fight WITH the other slaves for your freedom.

As porcus: Stop the humans from getting/escaping with the relic

  • Asymmetric 1vX
  • Immersive sound design
  • Play as a slave OR play as porcus
